overview:
Frank Grant brings to Adreima a long and successful track record of leading nationwide sales organizations and delivering solutions for hospitals across the country. As CSMO, Frank will be responsible for directing the companyâ€™s sales and marketing efforts. Prior to joining Adreima, Frank was Executive Director of North American Healthcare for Cisco Systems, where he was responsible for over $1 billion in annual sales to some of the countryâ€™s largest hospitals. He spearheaded Ciscoâ€™s entry into the healthcare market six years ago and quickly grew that division into Ciscoâ€™s fastest-growing vertical.
